room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz Prison Escape Room" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: Jailbreak was tough but as a team we did it with 34 seconds left. Awesome time. Definitely gonna do more.

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz Prison Escape Room" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: Went for my birthday to do Alcatraz with a group of 10 people. A couple of people too many for a small room, but it was awesome. Can't wait to do it again!!

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz Prison Escape Room" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: So much fun! We went last night and completed Prison Break. Now we can't wait to do the Jigsaw-inspired cabin!

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz Prison Escape Room" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: 6 of us escaped prison. We had a blast and can't wait to try another escape. Our guide was helpful when we needed her assistance. It was fun and interactive. We had an hour to escape and finished with 6 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz Prison Escape Room" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: This is no doubt the best thing I've ever done. Me and my boyfriend along with our two other friends did the Alcatraz Prison escape, I must say, IT WAS AWESOME. Required a lot of thinking out side the box (which was the point) but it's not like it was easy. Our group of 8 people finished with 3 minutes left! Even then I didn't think we'd make it. All of the staff was extremely nice. Jamie even took a picture of all of us to commemorate our success !! I would definitely recommend this it everyone I know (and I'm saying that honestly. It was a heck of a lot of fun!) the room was decorated perfectly and it made it even authentic. I will definitely be returning!!
